mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MVA_IFLY_INTELLIGENT_ASR (PID , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , CALLID , FULL_PATH) SELECT sys_guid () , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , CALLID , FULL_PATH FROM IVR_JT_LEAVWORD@HUAWEI_ICD_DB_LINK ivr WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT callid FROM MVA_IFLY_INTELLIGENT_ASR asr WHERE ivr.CALLID = asr.callid)
mapper.select: SELECT PID , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , CALLID , FULL_PATH , RMAVOICE_FILE_NAME , RMAFLAG , AID , IFLY_RESULT , INSERT_TIME , IFLYPARSE_STATUS ,ISSUBMIT FROM ICC_UNION.MVA_IFLY_INTELLIGENT_ASR WHERE ROWNUM <= #{top} AND RMAVOICE_FILE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND (IFLYPARSE_STATUS IS NULL OR IFLYPARSE_STATUS = 2 OR IFLYPARSE_STATUS = 3 OR IFLYPARSE_STATUS = 4) ORDER BY to_date (LEAV_WORD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
